Bindings.Binding: if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Start",true) else UseControl("Start",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Select",true) else UseControl("Select",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("A",true) else UseControl("A",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("B",true) else UseControl("B",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Up",true) else UseControl("Up",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Down",true) else UseControl("Down",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Left",true) else UseControl("Left",false) end
if keystate == "down" then UseControl("Right",true) else UseControl("Right",false) end
